parameters.name: MFABindRequired
parameters.description: Specifies whether the RAM user must bind a multi-factor authentication (MFA) device upon the next logon. Default value: `false`.

parameters.name: Password
parameters.description: The logon password of the RAM user. The password must meet the password strength requirements. For more information, see [GetPasswordPolicy](~~2337691~~).

parameters.name: PasswordResetRequired
parameters.description: Specifies whether the RAM user has to change the password upon logon. Default value: `false`.

parameters.name: UserName
parameters.description: The name of the RAM user.
